item.title: Urban Traffic Overhaul v21.2 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 28, 2025

Urban Traffic Overhaul v21.2 ATS

Updated to version 21.2
– due to a map corruption causing an invisible wall to suddenly completely block northbound I-5 in Portland OR. Fixed with 21.2 and 21.1 made unavailable.

Description
This mod greatly increases traffic density in major urban areas across the map; traffic elsewhere is kept to vanilla levels, which I think is realistic enough. It also widens freeways and urbanizes some areas that are particularly inaccurate in the original map. Use the available “Lite” version if you want only the scenery/signage changes in California and Phoenix Area.

(For compability with traffic spawn mods simply open the mod with a file archiver (7-Zip, WinRAR, …), open the “def” folder and delete “traffic_data.sii” and “traffic_rules_spawn.sui” inside its “world” folder)

All map DLC required
Compatible: 1.55.x

Credits: Quaristice

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Cummins Signature Gen II sounds v1.0 1.55 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 28, 2025

Cummins Signature Gen II sounds v1.0 1.55 ATS

This mod is Cummins Signature Gen 2 straight pipe and sport mufflers sound for SCS and modded trucks

Latest Version Feature:
– Cummins Signature Gen II 520-620HP with straight pipe sound (Straighties)
– Cummins Signature Gen II 520-620HP with sport mufflers sound (Sporties)
– Automatically activated engine fan
– Exhaust stack simulation effects
– Sound attenuation effects for realistic sound fade off from the distance
– Sound distortions and directional effects for realistic distortions from different positions around the truck

Credits: Slav Jerry

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Busscar busstar S1 V6 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 28, 2025

Busscar busstar S1 V6 1.55 ETS2

It sounds like you’re looking for information about the Busscar Busstar S1 V6 1.55 mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2).
Here’s a breakdown of what that generally entails:

What is the Busscar Busstar S1 V6 1.55 ETS2 Mod?
This is a player-created modification (mod) for Euro Truck Simulator 2 that adds a virtual representation of the Busscar Busstar S1 bus into the game. “V6” likely refers to a specific version or iteration of the mod, and “1.55” probably indicates the game version it’s compatible with or a specific update of the mod itself.
These types of mods are popular among ETS2 players who enjoy driving buses in the game, adding a lot of realism and variety beyond the default trucks.

Common Features of Bus Mods like this:
Detailed 3D Model: A high-quality visual representation of the Busscar Busstar S1, both exterior and interior.
Realistic Sounds: Engine sounds, air brakes, door sounds, and other audio elements specific to the bus.
Custom Animations: Functional doors, wipers, dashboard gauges, and other interactive elements.
Multiple Skins/Liveries: A variety of paint jobs (skins) from real-world bus companies or custom designs, often including an “edit skin” template for players to create their own.
Customization Options: Options for different accessories, interiors, engines, and transmissions, allowing players to personalize their bus.
Compatibility: Designed to work with specific versions of Euro Truck Simulator 2. Older mods might not function correctly with the latest game updates, so it’s always good to check.

Install the Mod:
Locate your Euro Truck Simulator 2 “mod” folder. This is typically found at `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod`.
Place the downloaded `.scs` file directly into this `mod` folder.
In-Game Activation: Launch ETS2, go to the Mod Manager (it’s usually accessible from the profile selection screen). Find the Busscar Busstar S1 mod in the list and enable it by moving it to the “Active Mods” side. Make sure to confirm your changes.
Mod Order: Sometimes, the order of mods matters. If you experience issues, try adjusting the mod’s priority.

Important Considerations:
Compatibility: Always check if the mod is compatible with your current version of Euro Truck Simulator 2. Mods made for older versions might cause crashes or not appear in the game.
Conflicts: Running too many mods, or mods that conflict with each other, can lead to game issues. If you have problems, try disabling other mods to see if the Busscar mod works on its own.

If you’re having trouble finding the “1.55” version specifically, you might find more updated versions or need to look for older archives on modding sites. Good luck!

Credits: ladrão

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Mascarello Granvia 2024 Multi-Chassis 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 28, 2025

Mascarello Granvia 2024 Multi-Chassis 1.55 ETS2

You’re asking about the Mascarello Granvia 2024 Multi-Chassis mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2)! This is a very popular bus among Brazilian ETS2 players, known for its detail and versatility.

What is the Mascarello Granvia 2024 Multi-Chassis ETS2 Mod?
This is a community-created modification (mod) that brings a highly detailed virtual version of the Mascarello Granvia 2024 urban bus into Euro Truck Simulator 2. The “Multi-Chassis” aspect means the mod allows you to choose from various real-world chassis options that this bus model is built upon, offering different engine, transmission, and suspension configurations. This makes for a more realistic and diverse driving experience.

Key Features You Can Expect from This Mod:
High-Quality 3D Model: Expect a very detailed exterior and interior, often with realistic textures and materials. Brazilian bus mods are frequently praised for their visual fidelity.
Multiple Chassis Options: This is a highlight! You’ll likely find chassis from manufacturers like:
Volkswagen (VW): Such as the Volksbus 17.260S.
Mercedes-Benz (MB): Including models like the OF-1619, OF-1726, or OF-1721L.
These chassis choices directly impact performance, handling, and even the dashboard layout in some cases.
Realistic Sounds: The mod will typically feature custom engine sounds, air brake sounds, door sounds, and other audio cues specific to the Granvia model and its various chassis.
Extensive Customization:
Skins/Liveries: A wide variety of real-world Brazilian bus company skins are usually included, along with editable templates. Many mods focus on companies from cities like Rio de Janeiro or patterns like BH (Belo Horizonte).
Interior Options: Different seat fabrics, dashboard colors, and internal accessories.
Functional Elements: Animated doors, wipers, realistic dashboard gauges, working GPS (often with a Waze-style interface), and even options like open hoods for screenshots.
External Accessories: Options for mirrors, headlights, taillights (often LED), three-part bumpers, and various wheel choices.
Ergonomic Design: The mod often aims to replicate the “Tablet Design” dashboard and improved ergonomics of the real Granvia 2024.
Compatibility: Designed for specific ETS2 game versions (e.g., 1.49.x, 1.53, 1.54, 1.55). Always check the mod description for compatibility.

Installation Steps:
Navigate to your Euro Truck Simulator 2 mod folder. This is usually located at: `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod`.
Copy the downloaded `.scs` file(s) directly into this `mod` folder.
Launch Euro Truck Simulator 2.
From the profile selection screen, click on “Mod Manager.”
Find the Mascarello Granvia 2024 mod in the list. Double-click it or click the arrow to move it to the “Active Mods” list on the right.
Ensure the mod is enabled and click “Confirm Changes.”
Mod Order/Priority: Sometimes, the order of mods in the Mod Manager can affect functionality. If you encounter issues, try adjusting its priority (moving it up or down in the active mods list).

Important Tips:
Game Version: Always verify that the mod is compatible with your current Euro Truck Simulator 2 version. Running an incompatible mod can cause crashes or glitches.
Conflicts: If you use many mods, there’s a chance of conflicts. If the bus doesn’t appear or causes issues, try disabling other mods to isolate the problem.

Driving the Mascarello Granvia 2024 in ETS2 can be a fantastic experience, especially if you enjoy urban routes or the feel of Brazilian public transport! Have fun!

Credits: daniel alves

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
